collections.name: actor

properties.name: actor_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each actor.

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The actor's first name.

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The actor's last name.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains information about each actor, including their first and last names.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The full name of an actor can be formed by combining the first_name and last_name.

collections.name: address

properties.name: address_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each address.

properties.name: address
properties.description: The primary street address.

properties.name: address2
properties.description: An optional second address line for additional details.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: address2 is for additional address information if available

properties.name: district
properties.description: The district or state where the address is located.

properties.name: city_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the city of the address.

properties.name: postal_code
properties.description: The postal code for the address.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A postal code is a series of letters or digits or both, sometimes including spaces or punctuation, included in a postal address for the purpose of sorting mail.

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone number associated with the address.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains address information for customers, staff, and stores.

collections.name: category

properties.name: category_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each category.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the category.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains a list of film categories, such as 'Action', 'Comedy', etc.

properties.name: city_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each city.

properties.name: city
properties.description: The name of the city.

properties.name: country_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the country where the city is located.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

properties.name: country_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each country.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The name of the country.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: Countries are grouped by continent. Examples: Africa (Algeria, Angola), Asia (Afghanistan, China), Europe (France, Germany), North America (Canada, Mexico), South America (Argentina, Brazil), Oceania (Australia, New Zealand).

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.name: customer

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each customer.

properties.name: store_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the store where the customer is registered.

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The customer's first name.

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The customer's last name.

properties.name: email
properties.description: The customer's email address.

properties.name: address_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the customer's address.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Indicates whether the customer is active. 1 for active, 0 for inactive.

properties.name: create_date
properties.description: The date the customer account was created.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains information about each customer, including their name, email, and address.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The full name of a customer can be formed by combining the first_name and last_name.

collections.name: film

properties.name: film_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each film.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the film.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A brief synopsis of the film.
sample values: A Epic Drama of a Feminist And a Mad ...
A Astounding Epistle of a Database Ad...
A Astounding Reflection of a Lumberja...
A Fanciful Documentary of a Frisbee A...
A Fast-Paced Documentary of a Pastry ...

properties.name: release_year
properties.description: The year the film was released.

properties.name: language_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the language of the film.

properties.name: original_language_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the original language of the film, if different.

properties.name: rental_duration
properties.description: The number of days a film can be rented for.

properties.name: rental_rate
properties.description: The cost to rent the film for the rental duration.

properties.name: length_
properties.description: The duration of the film in minutes.

properties.name: replacement_cost
properties.description: The cost to replace the film if it is lost or damaged.

properties.name: rating
properties.description: The MPA film rating (e.g., G, PG, PG-13).

properties.name: special_features
properties.description: A list of special features included with the film, such as 'Trailers' or 'Deleted Scenes'.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains information about each film in the inventory.

collections.name: film_actor

properties.name: actor_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the actor.

properties.name: film_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the film.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: A junction table linking actors to films, representing which actors appeared in which films.

collections.name: film_category

properties.name: film_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the film.

properties.name: category_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the category.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: A junction table linking films to categories.

collections.name: film_text

properties.name: film_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for the film, linking to the film table.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the film.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The full description of the film.
sample values: A Epic Drama of a Feminist And a Mad ...
A Astounding Epistle of a Database Ad...
A Astounding Reflection of a Lumberja...
A Fanciful Documentary of a Frisbee A...
A Fast-Paced Documentary of a Pastry ...

collections.description: Contains the full title and description for each film. This table is used for full-text search.

collections.name: inventory

properties.name: inventory_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each item in the inventory.

properties.name: film_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the film.

properties.name: store_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the store that holds this inventory item.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains information about each copy of a film in the store's inventory.

properties.name: language_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each language.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the language.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

properties.name: payment_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each payment.

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the customer who made the payment.

properties.name: staff_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the staff member who processed the payment.

properties.name: rental_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the rental associated with this payment.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: The amount of the payment.

properties.name: payment_date
properties.description: The date and time the payment was made.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

properties.name: rental_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each rental.

properties.name: rental_date
properties.description: The date and time the film was rented.

properties.name: inventory_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the inventory item that was rented.

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the customer who rented the film.

properties.name: return_date
properties.description: The date and time the film was returned. Null if not yet returned.

properties.name: staff_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the staff member who processed the rental.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.name: staff

properties.name: staff_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each staff member.

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The staff member's first name.

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The staff member's last name.

properties.name: address_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the staff member's address.

properties.name: picture
properties.description: A picture of the staff member.

properties.name: email
properties.description: The staff member's email address.

properties.name: store_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the store where the staff member works.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Indicates whether the staff member is active. 1 for active, 0 for inactive.

properties.name: username
properties.description: The staff member's username for logging in.

properties.name: password
properties.description: The staff member's password.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains information about each staff member.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The full name of a staff member can be formed by combining the first_name and last_name.

collections.name: store

properties.name: store_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each store.

properties.name: manager_staff_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the staff member who manages the store.

properties.name: address_id
properties.description: A foreign key identifier for the store's address.

properties.name: last_update
properties.description: The timestamp of the last update to the record.

collections.description: Contains information about each store, including its manager and address.
